title: Acute Appendicitis due to Rare Metastasis From Lung Cancer: A Case Report
details: KT Nguyen, TH Pham, THY Le, TKH Nguyen, TPN Vo… - Respirology Case Reports, 2025
abstract: Gastrointestinal metastasis from primary lung cancer is uncommon and metastasis to the appendix is particularly rare. It often presents with symptoms of acute appendicitis or remains asymptomatic, leading to incidental diagnosis. We report a …
